DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas:
[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Lanuguage"},"ReadFormula":"switch(MODBUSR(SH, 6900, UInt16), 1, "NL", "EN")"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Aktualny rezim"},"ReadFormula":"switch(modbusr(A, 4020, uint16), 
0, "Standby", 
1, "Bootloader",
2, "Non Blocking Error",
3, "Blocking Error", 
4, "Manual",
5, "Holiday",
6, "Night Ventilation", 
7, "Party", 
8, "Bypass Boost",
9, "Normal Boost",
10, "Auto CO2", 
11, "Auto eBus",
12, "Auto Modbus",
13, "Auto LAN/WLAN Portal",
14, "Auto LAN/WLAN Local", "N/A")"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Modbus Control"},"ReadFormula":"VAR Va:=MODBUSR(SH, 8000, Int16);

IF Va = 0
 RETURN ("Switched OFF [Error]");
ELSEIF Va = 1
 RETURN ("Switch [Error]");
ELSEIF Va = 2
 RETURN ("Flow rate [Default]");
ELSE
 RETURN ("Error");
END"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Modbus Interface Type"},"ReadFormula":"VAR Va:=MODBUSR(SH, 7990, UInt16);
IF Va = 0
 RETURN ("Brink");
ELSEIF Va = 1
 RETURN ("Brink connect [Default]");
ELSEIF Va = 2
 RETURN ("External Customer");
ELSE
 RETURN ("Error!");
END"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Stav predhrievača"},"ReadFormula":"switch(modbusr(A,4060,int16), 
 0, "Inicializácia", 
 1, "Neaktívny", 
 2, "Aktívny",
 3, "Testovací režim",
 "Unknown");"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Výkon predhrievača [%]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A,4061,int16);"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Teplota NTC1 [C]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A,4081,int16)/10"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Stav filtra"},"ReadFormula":"var state := modbusr(A,4100,int16);
return(switch(todouble(state), 0, "ok", "polluted"))"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Hodnota snímača CO2 1 [ppm]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A,4201,int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Hodnota snímača CO2 2 [ppm]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A,4203,int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Hodnota snímača CO2 3 [ppm]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A,4205,int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Hodnota snímača CO2 4 [ppm]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A,4207,int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Nerovnováha povolená [0-on;1-off]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(H,6033,uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Posun nerovnováhy pri prívode [%]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(H,6035, int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Režim obtoku [0 - auto; 1 - zatvoreny; 2 - otvoreny]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(H,6100,int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Režim snímača CO2 [0 - VYP, 1 - ZAP]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(H, 6150,uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Adresa Slave Modbus"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(H,7991,int16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"(namerana hodnota) aktuálna hodnota prietoku výfukového vyduchu [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4042, UInt16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"(namerana hodnota) aktuálna hodnota privádzaného vzduchu [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4032, UInt16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"(pozadovana hodnota) bod nastavenia prietoku výfukový vzduch [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4041, UInt16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"(pozadovana hodnota) bod nastavenia privádzaného vzduchu [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4031, UInt16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"aktuálny tlak odsávania [Pa]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4024, Int16)/10"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"snímač teploty ventilátora odsávania [C]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4046, Int16) / 10"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"snímač teploty ventilátora prívodu [C]"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(A, 4036, uInt16) / 10"}]
DeviceProperties.ServiceActionsScripts:
[{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Set Interface Type to Brink Connect","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(SH, 7990, UInt16, 1)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Aktivovať ovládanie výkonu cez Modbus","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(SH, 8000, Int16, 2)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Appliance Reset","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(SH, 8011, UInt16, 1)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Nastavenie posunu nerovnováhy pri prívode ","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Posun nerovnováhy pri prívode [%]","Abbreviation":"per","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":-15,"MaxValue":15}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"if modbusr(sH,6036,int16) = per
else 
 modbusw(sH,6036,int16,per);
end"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Nastavenie posunu nerovnováhy pri odsávaní","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Posun nerovnováhy pri odsávaní [%]","Abbreviation":"per","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":-15,"MaxValue":15}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"if modbusr(sH,6036,int16,per) = per
else
modbusw(sH,6036,int16,per);
end"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Vynulovanie hlásenia filtra","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"modbusw(sh, 8010, int16,0)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Set Standby Mode","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(SH, 8003, UInt16, 1)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"End Standby Mode","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(SH, 8003, UInt16, 2)"}]

DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Po\u010Det dnu od posledn\u00ED vymeny"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4115, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Objem vzduchu od posledn\u00ED vymeny [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4116, Uint32)"}]
DeviceProperties.ReadState: if (MODBUSR(H, 6170, UInt16) = 1, addwarning("Upozorneni na vymenu filtru")); MODBUSR(A, 4100, UInt16)

DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas:
[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Status"},"ReadFormula":"switch(modbusr(A, 4030, uint16), 
0, "Idle",
1, "Running",
2, "Not Found - No Communication",
3, "Blocked",
4, "Fan Error", "N/A")"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Setpoint supply air [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4031, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Current value of supply air [m3/h]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4032, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"MassFlow inlet, actual value [kg/h]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4033, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Speed supply fan [RPM]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4034, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Speed inlet anemometer [RPM]"},"ReadFormula":"modbusr(A, 4035, Uint16)"}]
DeviceProperties.ReadInputLevel:
#switch(modbusr(A, 4030, uint16), #0, addinfo("Idle"), #1, addinfo("Running"), #2, adderror("Not Found - No Communication"), #3, adderror("Blocked"), #4, adderror("Fan Error"), "N/A");
LINEAR(MODBUSR(A, 4034, UInt16), 0, 0, maxRPM, 1)
